column5: is a bimonthly periodical about literature for children and young adults. In each issue
column6: The Horn Book Magazine includes articles about issues and trends in children's literature
column8: and reviews of new books for children.<ref>[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Horn_Book_Magazine Wikipedia]. Retrieved 23 April 2010.</ref>
